channel.title: hiring on David Haney
channel.description: Recent content in hiring on David Haney

item.title: Writing a Great Junior Tech Résumé
item.description: A few weeks back I wrote this tweet: 43 likes later, it’s clear to me that this topic is in-demand. So, let’s skip over the pleasantries and talk about how you can create a great technical résumé as a junior developer, from the perspective of me (a hiring manager). So let’s dive right in! I’m going to add photos of my junior résumé here as we go as well, to give you a nice visual of what I am talking about.

item.title: New Blog & Hiring Needs
item.description: Well I failed badly in my mission to blog every week of 2017. I guess life and stuff just got in the way in the end. I’ll try to be more consistent in the second half of 2018. Anyway, I bring some news: I have a new blog engine, and we are hiring at Stack Overflow! New blog engine I was previously using WordPress but had many issues and concerns with it.
